verbs.description: [ARG1: arnold kopelson platoon producer] [V: dies] [ARGM-TMP: at 83] [ARGM-CAU: arnold kopelson a versatile film producer whose credits ranged from the raunchy teen smash porky to the holocaust drama triumph of the spirit to the oscar - winning platoon died monday he was 83] family spokesman jeff sanderson told the associated press that kopelson died of natural causes at his home in beverly hills california he is survived by his wife and business partner anne kopelson and by three children on twitter fellow director william friedkin mourned his passing and joan collins posted a picture of her with kopelson and called him a great friend a brilliant producer and a fabulous dinner companion producer sumner redstone cbs claire simpson willem dafoe dino de laurentiis oliver stone france the associated press new york joel schumacher murder new york law school geoff sanderson director california dorothy chandler pavilion jeff sanderson michael douglas willem defoe arnold kopelson academy awards william friedkin beverly hills cannes beverly hills california

arnold kopelson platoon producer dies at 83 arnold kopelson a versatile film producer whose credits ranged from the raunchy teen smash [V: porky] to the holocaust drama triumph of the spirit to the oscar - winning platoon died monday he was 83 family spokesman jeff sanderson told the associated press that kopelson died of natural causes at his home in beverly hills california he is survived by his wife and business partner anne kopelson and by three children on twitter fellow director william friedkin mourned his passing and joan collins posted a picture of her with kopelson and called him a great friend a brilliant producer and a fabulous dinner companion producer sumner redstone cbs claire simpson willem dafoe dino de laurentiis oliver stone france the associated press new york joel schumacher murder new york law school geoff sanderson director california dorothy chandler pavilion jeff sanderson michael douglas willem defoe arnold kopelson academy awards william friedkin beverly hills cannes beverly hills california
